short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a word with a separator to downloaded filenames

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly organize your downloads! This extension automatically adds the website's domain name to downloaded files, keeping your files tidy and easy to locate. Install now and say farewell to download clutter.
